mapper.insert: insert into travel_group (group_id, group_name, creation_date, uuid, group_master) values (UUID(), #{groupName}, now(), #{uuid}, true)
insert into travel_group (group_id, group_name, creation_date, uuid, group_master) values (#{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{creationDate}, #{uuid}, false)
mapper.select: select g.group_id, g.group_name, g.uuid, g.group_master, u.email, u.nickname, u.profile_img from travel_group as g join user as u on g.uuid = u.uuid where group_id = #{groupId}
select group_id, group_name, creation_date from travel_group where group_id = #{groupId} and group_master = true
